page.title: 04COMBE STREET LANE
page.content: Mr.and Mrs.Harold Cowcher have been living at 42,Coombe Street Lane for 31 years.The house they live in was built in 1937.When they moved into this house,the road was a narrow mud track,with no pavements and no lighting.Mudford Recreation Ground was a Pig farm with a narrow walkway going through it. There were just a few houses in the lane,but gradually people bought land and built houses in other people's gardens. There was a shop in Coombe Street Lane,it was in a shack.It sold groceries.There was a Nursery behind and if you asked for a lettuce the man would go and cut one for you.Number 54 is where the shop used to be. The road runs along the top of the escarpment,the houses are large and have fine views over Somerset.
